name: Bravo Studio Tag Manager
description:
Always switching tabs to find the right tag for your Figma layers? Use Bravo Studio Tag Manager to quickly access and add layer tags to your Bravo Studio projects.


The plugin just adds (or removes) tags from your layer names.

Disclaimer: I am not affiliated with Bravo Studio in any way, I just built this plugin to help with my workflow and thought it could help others too.
